attributes.comment:
Families and Family history is a good thing for individuals to be interested in, it
gives a sense of continuity and to be able to pass this on to future generations is
necessary to maintain a stability to all things.
A lot people are interested in this activity and there will be more to come, but if
our government starts limiting access to this information by raising the costs of
getting documentation, many people will have to give up because they simply can
NOT afford such extreem hikes in the charges you are suggesting.
I as many others are hoping that you will reconsider.
Thank you for your time.
Carolyn
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Carolyn Lewis
